page.title: 10LIFE STYLES
page.content: Young people in our area are very { {fashion conscious.}Girls are seen wearing 3/4 length trousers in pastel colours and baggy jumpers.Either high or low heeled shoes are in fashion and chunky plastic jewellery is popular. Boys' fashion is casual,with slip-on shoes called loafers,and trousers with many zips.Boys and girls will perm their hair and highlight it with colour.Makeup for girls emphasizes the eyes and lips with bright colours and eyeliner.{Cafes }&{restaurants }in our area are snackbars or fast food takeaways.They provide instant food needed by people with busy { {life styles}.
